title: What rank do I need to get in pessat to get into AI/ML in RR branch and what marks do I need to get to get that rank?

comments.body:
Under 1500
Marks I would say around 130
Also remember this year there will be negative marking
So hopefully less marks will be required
Oh. How much will be deducted per question
don't worry about that now. write the exam as best as you can and when you get the rank is when you should worry about cutoffs
I have the cutoffs of all the branches of the last two years if you want
Yeah pls send it to me too :)
